World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 8 日星期一 20:54:45 GMT 120
US says Bangladesh elections were not free and fairThe United States shares the view that the weekend's elections in Bangladesh were not free and fair, the U.S. State Department said on Monday, adding that Washington was concerned by reports of vote irregularities and condemned violence that took place. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 20:32:55 GMT VLIY5OGKRNPYPD6ZG6NWYACMTU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/us-says-bangladesh-elections-were-not-free-fair-2024-01-08/Kanishka Singh世界亚太地区
Tourist bus crashes in Brazil, killing 25At least 25 people are dead and six injured after a minibus carrying tourists from a coastal trip collided with a truck in Brazil's northeastern state of Bahia, local authorities said on Monday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 20:06:18 GMT I4NI6AHBNNJFJG2VWG7KKPU3GU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/tourist-bus-crashes-brazil-killing-25-2024-01-08/Reuters世界美洲
New caravan forms in Mexico as frustrated migrants complain about visa delaysA new migrant caravan of approximately 2,000 people formed in southern Mexico on Monday, largely made up of people that have been on the move since Christmas Eve who say the Mexican government's promises of transit visas last week never materialized. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 19:46:39 GMT EC7DDRH66JIRDEDW2XS3Z6TGV4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/new-caravan-forms-mexico-frusterated-migrants-complain-about-visa-delays-2024-01-08/Jacob Garcia世界美洲
Niger tribunal grants ousted president's son provisional release from house arrestNiger's military tribunal granted the son of ousted President Mohamed Bazoum, Mohamed Bazoum Salem, provisional release from house arrest in the capital Niamey on Monday, it said in a statement. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 19:30:54 GMT UG2OILWFWFLBZPIJE6Q7NWJFG4 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/niger-tribunal-grants-ousted-presidents-son-provisional-release-house-arrest-2024-01-08/Reuters世界非洲
Pentagon says not planning a US withdrawal from IraqThe Pentagon said on Monday it was not currently planning to withdraw its roughly 2,500 troops from Iraq, despite Baghdad's announcement last week it would begin the process of removing the U.S.-led military coalition from the country. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 19:14:42 GMT A7JPGVE62RM7PO4ZVYAROBZCHA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/pentagon-says-not-planning-us-withdrawal-iraq-2024-01-08/Idrees Ali, Phil Stewart世界中东
US defense official to visit Guyana amid border tensions with VenezuelaA top U.S. defense official will visit Guyana on Monday and Tuesday, the U.S. embassy in the South American country said, as tensions between Guyana and neighboring Venezuela simmer in a border dispute over the oil-rich Esequibo region. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 19:10:43 GMT QE7UOVDVVBKDZFGQ4YANIRWWT4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/us-defense-official-visit-guyana-amid-border-tensions-with-venezuela-2024-01-08/Reuters世界美洲
Israeli man pleads for his release in latest Gaza hostage videoElad Katzir, an Israeli farmer held hostage in Gaza for over three months, was seen pleading for his freedom in a video posted online by Palestinian group Islamic Jihad on Monday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 18:29:14 GMT F23SJ6JR5VL7TLFETIAVKYOGOM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-man-pleads-his-release-latest-gaza-hostage-video-2024-01-08/Reuters世界中东
UK condemns 'intimidation and violence' in Bangladesh electionBritain on Monday condemned what it called "acts of intimidation and violence" that took place during the general election in Bangladesh, raising concerns over the number of arrests of opposition party members. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 18:00:43 GMT GFYIKGKUNZK3FPUWHF2MXZPBRI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/uk-condemns-intimidation-violence-bangladesh-election-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
Canada, partners take Iran to UN council over downed Ukrainian jetCanada, Britain, Sweden and Ukraine on Monday formally complained to the U.N. aviation council in their bid to hold Iran accountable for the downing of a passenger airliner in January 2020 that killed 176 people, they said on Monday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 17:45:40 GMT XT7P22WATNP45MPCXCIR2LZTFQ https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-partners-take-iran-un-council-over-downed-ukrainian-jet-2024-01-08/Reuters世界
France's Macron launches political reset with PM changeFrench Prime Minister Elisabeth Borne resigned on Monday, as President Emmanuel Macron seeks to give a new impetus to his second mandate ahead of European parliament elections and the Paris Olympics this summer. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 17:13:58 GMT KGCMEZSM3FPFFBGDR5URV4G55U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/french-pm-elisabeth-borne-resigns-macrons-office-2024-01-08/Michel Rose世界欧洲
Bangladesh PM faces tougher, more uncertain new term, analysts sayStabilising a fractious political landscape and fixing an economy still reeling from the ripple effects of the Russia-Ukraine war should top Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's agenda for her next five-year term, analysts said on Monday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 16:23:30 GMT YPLF44EVYVI6VNSCKZOUEQJCTA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bangladesh-pm-faces-tougher-more-uncertain-new-term-analysts-say-2024-01-08/Sudipto Ganguly, Ruma Paul世界亚太地区
